title: Hollow Knight
description: A challenging 2D action-adventure through a vast interconnected world. Battle enemies, explore forgotten caverns, and uncover ancient secrets in this beautifully hand-drawn indie masterpiece.

title: Stardew Valley
description: Build the farm of your dreams in this peaceful farming simulator. Grow crops, raise animals, craft items, and build relationships with the townspeople in this charming countryside adventure.

title: Celeste
description: Help Madeline survive her journey to the top of Celeste Mountain in this tight platformer. Uncover secrets, overcome challenging obstacles, and confront her inner demons in this heartfelt story.

title: Hades
description: Defy the god of the dead in this hack-and-slash roguelike. Battle out of hell with ever-changing challenges, unlock powerful upgrades, and uncover an epic story with stunning art and voice acting.

title: Undertale
description: A unique RPG where nobody has to die. Navigate a quirky underground world filled with monsters, puzzles, and memorable characters. Your choices determine the fate of everyone.

title: Dead Cells
description: A roguelite metroidvania with tight combat and fluid movement. Fight through an ever-changing castle, unlock permanent upgrades, and master intense boss battles in this addictive action game.

title: Terraria
description: Dig, fight, explore, and build in this 2D sandbox adventure. Battle monsters, craft weapons and armor, build structures, and discover treasures in procedurally generated worlds.

title: Cuphead
description: A brutally challenging run-and-gun action game with stunning 1930s cartoon art style. Battle epic bosses, master precise platforming, and enjoy hand-drawn animation with a jazzy soundtrack.

title: Among Us
description: Play with 4-15 players online as you attempt to complete tasks on a spaceship while identifying the impostor among the crew. Teamwork, deception, and deduction are key to survival.

title: Slay the Spire
description: A roguelike deck-building game where you craft a unique deck and climb the spire. Battle enemies with strategic card combos, unlock new cards, and face challenging bosses in ever-changing runs.

title: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth
description: A randomly generated action RPG shooter with heavy roguelike elements. Guide Isaac through procedurally generated dungeons, fight bizarre enemies, and discover hundreds of items and synergies.

title: Ori and the Blind Forest
description: A visually stunning platform-adventure game with a deeply emotional story. Navigate a beautiful hand-painted forest, solve puzzles, and restore light to a dying world.

title: Shovel Knight
description: A retro-inspired platformer with tight controls and creative level design. Battle through knights of the Order of No Quarter with your trusty shovel blade in this 8-bit adventure.

title: Minecraft
description: The ultimate sandbox game where creativity knows no bounds. Build, explore, survive, and thrive in blocky worlds. Mine resources, craft tools, and shape your own adventure.

title: Katana ZERO
description: A stylish neo-noir action-platformer featuring instant-death combat and time manipulation. Slash through enemies, manipulate time, and unravel a dark conspiracy in this cinematic experience.

title: Return of the Obra Dinn
description: A unique detective puzzle game set on an abandoned merchant ship. Use supernatural powers to witness the moment of death and deduce the fate of all 60 crew members in this 1-bit mystery.

title: Outer Wilds
description: An open-world mystery about a solar system trapped in an endless time loop. Explore planets, uncover secrets, and piece together the truth about ancient civilizations in this space exploration game.

title: Firewatch
description: A first-person mystery set in the Wyoming wilderness. Play as a fire lookout uncovering strange occurrences in the forest while building a relationship through radio conversations.

title: Gris
description: A serene and evocative platformer with no dialogue. Journey through a fading world, restore color and hope, and experience a touching story of overcoming hardship through beautiful art and music.

title: A Short Hike
description: A peaceful exploration game about hiking to the top of a mountain. Meet quirky characters, discover hidden treasures, and enjoy the freedom to explore at your own pace in this charming adventure.

title: Don't Starve Together
description: A multiplayer survival game set in a dark, whimsical world. Gather resources, craft items, build bases, and battle strange creatures while trying to survive the harsh wilderness with friends.

title: Limbo
description: A dark and atmospheric puzzle-platformer with minimalist design. Guide a boy through a dangerous world filled with deadly traps and mysteries in this haunting black-and-white adventure.

title: Hotline Miami
description: A brutal top-down action game set in 1980s Miami. Clear rooms of enemies with fast-paced combat, unlock weapons and masks, and unravel a surreal story with a pulsing electronic soundtrack.

title: Enter the Gungeon
description: A bullet-hell dungeon crawler with roguelike elements. Battle through procedurally generated floors, collect absurd weapons, dodge endless bullets, and defeat challenging bosses in the Gungeon.

title: FTL: Faster Than Light
description: A space-based roguelike strategy game about managing a spaceship and crew. Navigate through sectors, manage resources, upgrade your ship, and make strategic decisions in intense real-time battles.

title: Risk of Rain 2
description: A 3D multiplayer roguelike with chaotic action. Fight through hordes of enemies, stack powerful items, unlock diverse survivors, and battle massive bosses in increasingly difficult runs.

title: Braid
description: A puzzle-platformer with time-manipulation mechanics. Solve clever puzzles by rewinding time, explore beautifully painted worlds, and uncover a deeply philosophical narrative about relationships and loss.

title: Inside
description: A dark atmospheric puzzle-platformer from the creators of Limbo. Guide a boy through a dystopian world filled with environmental puzzles and disturbing secrets in this haunting cinematic experience.

title: The Stanley Parable
description: A first-person exploration game about choice and narrative. Follow or defy the narrator's instructions as Stanley, an office worker, and discover multiple branching storylines and hilarious endings.

title: Bastion
description: An action RPG with beautiful hand-painted artwork and dynamic narration. Build a safe haven, explore lush environments, battle enemies with customizable weapons, and uncover the story of the Calamity.
